alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 6:12PM AKST until December 30 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and strong winds occuring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches are expected. West winds gusting 20 to 35 mph with visibility one quarter mile or less at times over Elliot Highway summits through the late evening. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for significant reductions in visibility at times due to blowing snow over summits. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of ice are occurring This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
